contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of May, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED as to the first issue only, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby REVERSED and the matter is remanded for proceedings consistent with Walker v. Eleby, 842 A.2d 389 (Pa.2004). The remaining issue in the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
